verses.roman:
sei yāi' āra grāme kare upadeśa
ei-mata 'vaiṣṇava' haila saba dakṣiṇa-deśa

synonyms: sei—that man; yāi'-going; āra—different; grāme—to the villages; kare—gives; upadeśa—instruction; ei-mata—in this way; vaiṣṇava—devotees; haila—became; saba—all; dakṣiṇa-deśa—the people of South India.
translation: In this way, as those men went from one village to another, all the people of South India became devotees.
